participant_1.background:
I dress for my audience.
I am a good mother, but I need to learn to treat my girlfriend better.
i enjoy hanging out with friends and family.
my dad owns a appliance store that i do not want to inherit.
i own 30 pairs of shoes.

participant_2.background:
I love to make tasty carrot soup in my spare time.
i love comic books.
i prefer winter over fall.
I would like to learn how to train my dogs to behave better.
I like music that is upbeat and energetic, so I can keep my spirits up while I'm on bed rest.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well! Just got done making some carrot soup, it's my favorite.
Oh nice! I love carrot soup too! I usually make it in the winter.
Oh yeah, it's the perfect winter soup. I also love comic books. Do you read them?
I do! I'm a big fan of Marvel and DC.
Me too! I also like some independent comics. I think I have a few in my bag.
Cool! I'd love to see them sometime.
Sure! I'm always happy to share my comics with people.
What do you like to do in your spare time?
I like to read, watch movies, and play video games.
Sounds like we have a lot in common! I also like to read, watch movies, and play video games.
That's great! We should definitely hang out sometime.
Yeah, that would be fun! I'm free this weekend.
Me too! I'll bring some comic books and we can watch a movie.
